item.title: Cicada 3301 0x01| The Beginning
item.description: Hello, We are looking for highly intelligent individuals. To find them, we have devised a test. Thursday, 5th of January, 2012. The following image is posted to 4Chan's Paranormal board, /x/: This got the attention of /x/, many citing it as the work of various government agencies; others calling it just another Alternate Reality Game (ARG). One thing, however, was certain: the rabbit hole dives deep. Let us begin on the current story of Cicada 3301.
